entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:12 a.m. PDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chetwynd Airport 9:00 AM MST Wednesday 10 May 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 16 km

Wind: WSW 8 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Widespread smoke. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Otherwise clear. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Widespread smoke. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
